meanings.definition: A person who suffers from asthma.
meanings.sent1: Many asthmatics carry inhalers with them.
meanings.sent2: The doctor specializes in treating asthmatics.
meanings.sent3: The group of asthmatics had a race to see who could run the shortest distance.
meanings.sent4: Her wheezing breaths marked her as one of the asthmatics in the room.
meanings.sent5: The school nurse keeps a list of all the asthmatics in the student body.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to asthma or asthmatics.
meanings.sent1: The asthmatics clinic offers specialized care.
meanings.sent2: She researched the latest asthmatics treatments.
meanings.sent3: The asthmatics-friendly park had extra oxygen stations.
meanings.sent4: The asthmatics alarm system alerted the staff of any air quality issues.
meanings.sent5: His asthmatics symptoms improved after using the prescribed medication.
